title: Egghead's robot (Captioned)
creator_credit: Australian Council for Children's Film and Television, Cecil Musk and Milo Lewis
brief_description: A very funny comedy about Paul “Egghead” Wentworth, the son of an inventor, who makes a look-alike robot to do his chores and replace him at sports. All goes well until the robot is named “cricketer of the year”, then blows a fuse in the compost heap! Written by Leif Saxon. Rated: G
